description:
This course covers how to get started with Microsoft PowerPoint 2013. Students will learn how to navigate the PowerPoint environment, create and save a presentation and learn how to access the help system. This course is taught by Debbie Fierst.

Total Video Time: 30 minutes

Enjoyed what you saw? What to learn more about Microsoft Office PowerPoint 2013?

Check out the full Microsoft Office PowerPoint 2013 Basic Training Course
title: PowerPoint 2013 - Getting Started
